CustomField.formula: (TEXT(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Deal_Type__c) <> "Renewal" && TEXT(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Deal_Type__c) <> "Early Renewal" && (SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c <= Initial_Term_Length__c)) || ((TEXT(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Deal_Type__c) = "Renewal" || TEXT(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Deal_Type__c) = "Early Renewal") && (SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c > Initial_Term_Length__c)) || TEXT(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Deal_Type__c) = "New Business"
CustomField.label: Outgoing Document - Show First Term Fees
